entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:11 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain near noon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
